ygData.subject: Lambent bits and pieces

ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone!!

Just a quickie, since I've spent all my remaining cash on buying some
Lambent armour (even though I think I got a really fantastic deal
hehe) I'm looking to finish off the set so I can at least say I've
completed it!

I'm happy at finding just about all the bits and pieces to make the
last few parts, but I'm just not sure where or how tough the Solusek
bits are. Playing at the more quiet times it's difficult to find
anyone at all inside there when I'm on so I've got no knowledge!

Can anyone gimme a few hints about where and how tough the Solusek
Mage and the Solusek Champion are. An opinion of how frequent the
spawn and drops are would be helpful too ;-)

Thanks muchly!

PS Hi to Shada, who I met in person last night while on my first Hill
Giant hunting trip! My heroine *sigh*

--
Saldara, High Elf Wizard (30 retired)
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (27)
Mith Marr server
